/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the blend of modern and traditional styles that are characteristic of Beijing. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are muted, adding to the overall calm and serene atmosphere.
